downloadTitle: System Center Virtual Machine Manager Privacy Statement
downloadDescription: This is the Privacy Statement for the System Center Virtual Machine Manager products.
detailsSection:
This document download provides the Privacy Statement for the System Center Virtual Machine Manager 2008 and System Center Virtual Machine Manager 2008 R2 products.

For the Privacy Statement for Virtual Machine Manager for System Center 2012, see Virtual Machine Manager for System Center Privacy Statement.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button to start the download.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
